name: CarilohaComfortBase
0:
”Alexa, ask cariloha base to find device.”
”Alexa, ask cariloha base to zero g.”
”Alexa, ask cariloha base to lower foot.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cariloha base
des: Control your Cariloha bed with your voice! Use voice commands to use the available motion, lighting, massage and other features of your Cariloha bed. You can raise and lower your head, elevate and lower your feet, put the bed in Zero-G for ultimate comfort, start, stop, and increase or decrease massage intensity, turn under-bed lighting on and off, and more. Cariloha voice-enabled adjustable base required. Availability of different features depends on features installed on the base.
